description: This notification is generated when a user logs in.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfLogIn HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user logs out.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfLogOut HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource s EXAMPLE

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource

description: This notification is generated when a user fails to log in
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfLogInAuthenFailure HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource s EXAMPLE HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserAuthFailureReason i 1

description: It represents the name of the logging user when login with authentication
otherwise login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserName

description: Login mode, such as Console, AUX, TTY, VTY etc.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalSource

description: The reason why a user failed to log in.
variables.name: HPN-ICF-UI-MAN-MIB::hpnicfTerminalUserAuthFailureReason
